Package photos.model

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
photos.model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the information for a photo
Author:
Usayed Mahmud

  • Constructor Details

    • Photo

      public Photo(String caption, String path, Calendar date)
      constructor for a photo with no tags
      Parameters:
      caption - the caption for the photo
      path - the path of the photo, can be either global or local path
      date - the date that the photo was last modified

    • Photo

      public Photo(String caption, String path, Calendar date, ArrayList<Tag> tags)
      constructor for a photo that already has tags
      Parameters:
      caption - the caption for the photo
      path - the path of the photo, can be either global or local path
      date - the date that the photo was last modified
      tags - the list of tags for the photo

  • Method Details

    • addTag

      public boolean addTag(String name, String value)
      adds a tag to the photo's list of tags
      Parameters:
      name - the name/type of the tag, e.g. location or person
      value - the value of the tags
      Returns:
      true if the tag has been added to the list

    • removeTag

      public void removeTag(Tag tag)
      removes the given tag
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag that should be removed

    • getTags

      public ArrayList<Tag> getTags()
      returns the list of tags
      Returns:
      tags list

    • printTags

      public String printTags()
      returns the string representation of the tag list
      Returns:
      tag list

    • setCaption

      public void setCaption(String name)
      sets photo caption to given name
      Parameters:
      name - the new caption

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Photo photo)
      checks if this photo is equal to the given photo
      Parameters:
      photo - the photo that is checked for equality
      Returns:
